Definition: The input is a tweet. The tweet can be classified as Hate Speech, Offensive, or Normal. If the tweet contains threatening language towards the community targeted, then the tweet belongs to the Hate Speech class. If the tweet contains abusive or discriminatory language towards the community targeted, then the tweet belongs to the Offensive class. If the tweet does not contain any offensive language, then the tweet belongs to the Normal class.
